short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find anyone's email and phone number

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Find real-time verified email addresses from professional social networks for free.

Wiza’s free email finder allows you to view accurate work and personal email addresses in seconds.

✔ Find emails on social media profiles

Using the Wiza email finder, you’ll be able to pull up real-time verified email addresses (both business and personal) on any professional social media profile that you view—in a matter of seconds.

✔ Bulk export leads from searches

Wiza’s email finder enables you to export your searches and saved lead lists with real-time verified email addresses (and phone numbers).

✔ Save emails to lists and export to CSV

Download your saved lists and exports to CSV in a single click, including contact name, employer, job title, email addresses, phone numbers, and 30+ other data points.

✔ Sync emails directly to your CRM and sales tools in one click

Connect Wiza to your CRM (HubSpot, Salesforce, and more) and then instantly sync contacts with email addresses to your platform with one click.

✔ Trusted by 50,000+ users including:

Sales teams to prospect and build pipeline
Founders to find their first and next customers
Agency owners to perform lead generation for clients
Marketers to reach out about collaboration and link builder
Recruiters to source candidates and acquire talent

Join Wiza today and get 25 free credits every month: https://wiza.co/auth/signup

We appreciate your support and please feel free to reach out to us with any questions or needs via our live website chat or at hello@wiza.com
